snippet.title: Mariana Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3197400/Mariana/?beta=1

About this game
Mariana is an underwater exploration and Metroidvania indie game. In this game you are dropped into an unknown trench to explore. You will find fantastical creatures and rare artifacts. Fight bosses and mini-bosses in order to dive as deep as possible and uncover the mystery of the trench.

Warning: Game contains imagery that may be harmful to players with photosensitive epilepsy or similar condition.

Features:

Fight in adrenaline filled boss battles against giant sea creatures.
Explore strange worlds and fantastical creatures.
Customize your character with fun equipment.
Tame and fight alongside a pet catfish.
Original Art and Soundtrack.
Horror elements with a sprinkle of humor.
An original (hot) character with trades and dialogue. 
Hidden lore and mysteries to be uncovered.
